[h1] Gnomes Garden 3: The thief of castles [/h1]
Collection game of 2016.

The gnome princess is finally back home, but someone stole the castle. Along with everything that goes with it. So she has to set out again to find it and bring it back. So much for the frame story.

A very well made collecting game. And it's a lot of fun. A mix of different difficulties, never too difficult but not easy either.
The cards are very well made, rather minimalistic, but therefore good for overviews. Even if it looks like it, it is not intended for children. There are masses of thieves here and we certainly don't want to teach children that. The story is really silly, but not badly done.
All in all I was very satisfied, a great casual game. My recommendation has it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198201246082', 'num_games_owned': 3232, 'num_reviews': 1500, 'playtime_forever': 280, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 280, 'last_played': 1653585028}
review:
Gnomes Garden 3: The Thief of Castles, Workroom7 ve Creobit tarafından geliştirilen bir strateji oyunudur. Oyuncular, çalınan prenses ve gnomların hikayesinde, Gnomes Garden serisinin önceki oyunlarından tanıdık olan birçok özellikle karşılaşacaklar.

Oyun, oyuncuların farklı görevleri tamamlamasını ve kaynakları toplamasını gerektirir. Görevler genellikle belirli bir süre içinde tamamlanmalıdır. Görevleri tamamlamak için, oyuncular gnomlarını kaynakları toplamak, yapılar inşa etmek ve kaynakları kullanarak ürünler üretmek gibi çeşitli görevlere yönlendirebilirler.

Oyunda, gnomlarınızın güçlü yanlarını kullanmanız gerekebilir. Örneğin, bazı gnomlar kaynakları daha hızlı toplarken, diğerleri ürünleri daha hızlı üretir. Gnomlarınızın doğru görevlerde kullanılması, görevleri tamamlamanıza yardımcı olacaktır.

Oyun, farklı zorluk seviyeleri sunar ve ilerledikçe görevler daha zor hale gelir. Ayrıca, oyunda çeşitli düşmanlar ve engellerle de karşılaşacaksınız.

Grafikler, diğer Gnomes Garden oyunlarına benzer şekilde, parlak ve renkli bir çizgi film tarzında tasarlanmıştır. Oyunun müzikleri ve ses efektleri de hoştur ve oyuncuların oyunun atmosferine daha iyi adapte olmalarına yardımcı olur.

Gnomes Garden 3: The Thief of Castles, serinin hayranları için keyifli bir strateji oyunudur. Oyun, önceki oyunlarda olduğu gibi eğlenceli bir oynanış sunar ve görevlerin zorlaşmasıyla birlikte zorluk seviyesi artar.

review:
죽지도 않고 또 다시 돌아온 [b]《노움들의 정원 3: 성을 훔친 자》[/b]다. 와, 이게 시리즈로 이렇게 길게 이어질 줄 몰랐다. 하는 법은 전작들과 완전히 똑같다. 달라진 게 '아무것도' 없다. 아, 하나 있구나. 그렘린으로 건물 가동시켜서 자원 얻는 거. 이 시리즈를 하면, 어느 순간 살짝 신경질이 나는데··· 왜 그런줄 아는가? 이유야 여러가지 있겠지만, 개인적으로는 게임성에 걸맞지 않은 '플레이 타임' 때문이라고 본다. 아니, 결국 미션만 조금씩 다르고 하는 일은 똑같은데, 왜 이렇게 레벨을 많이 만들어 놔서 사람을 지치게 하는 걸까?

 + 유튜브에 모든 레벨 '3성' 클리어 영상이 존재
 + 트레이딩 카드 존재(플탐 대비 파밍시간 적절)

 - 사람 지칠 정도로 많은 레벨의 수(총 50레벨)
 - 미친 근데 각각의 레벨이 최소 5분을 잡아 먹네?
 - 처음 5레벨을 넘기고 나면 급격한 지루함이 찾아 옴
 - 찰나의 순간으로 3성 못 얻었을 때의 깊은 빡침

시벌, 내가 여기서 별 3개 획득하려고 뭐하는 짓인지. 이거 얻으려고 같은 레벨 뺑뺑이 돌 시간이면, 다른 인디 게임 한두 개는 엔딩 봤을텐데말이야. 무조건 유튜브에 있는 클리어 영상을 참고하여 플레이하시길. 그래야 반복 횟수를 조금이나마 줄일 수 있습니다. 귀찮은 거 저도 압니다. 알트탭해서 영상 보고, 플레이하고, 알트탭하고··· 진짜 짜증나죠. 근데 그게 최선이에요. 혼자서 같은 레벨 대여섯 번 돌리는 것보다, 클릭마다 영상 보면서 따라하는 게 그나마 스트레스가 덜합니다. 레벨 하나당 최소 5분입니다, 5분. 영상 보면서 10분 정도로 레벨 클리어하는 게, 혼자서 맨땅에 헤딩하는 것보다 훨씬 낫습니다. 어떻게 그렇게 단언할 수 있냐고요? 저는 해봤잖아요. 진심, 이것도 근데 미치도록 피곤한 일이에요. 도전과제를 노린다면 멘탈을 단단히 잡으시길 바랍니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198796851430', 'num_games_owned': 927, 'num_reviews': 3722, 'playtime_forever': 6338, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6338, 'last_played': 1675188037}
review:
这是一款解谜游戏，作为系列作的第三部作品，本作在视觉风格和游戏机制上延续了前作的特点。然而在美丽的表象下，游戏却难以掩饰其内容的空洞和缺乏创新。

首先在游戏的画面表现上的确让人眼前一亮。游戏采用了童话故事般的画风，精美的场景设计和细腻的角色造型为玩家带来了一种沉浸式的游戏体验。然而这种美好并不能掩盖游戏在内容上的匮乏。

相较于前作，本作在谜题设计上并未带来太多新颖元素，依然采用了寻找物品、拼图等传统解谜方式。这些谜题往往缺乏挑战性，使得玩家在游戏中很难感受到智力上的满足。同时游戏中的一些谜题设计还存在明显的逻辑漏洞，让人感到困惑。

此外游戏的剧情也让人失望。本作的故事线索较为单一，缺乏深度和波折。玩家在游戏中扮演的是一位公主，需要找回被偷走的城堡。然而整个故事过程过于平淡，让人难以产生共鸣。

在游戏系统方面也存在一些问题。游戏中的操作并不流畅，人物移动速度较慢，导致玩家在探索场景时容易感到疲惫。此外游戏中的存档机制也让人不满，经常使玩家在重复探索和解决谜题时感到无奈。

综上所述，虽然在视觉表现上具有一定的吸引力，但在游戏内容、谜题设计、剧情和系统方面均存在不足。美丽的表象难以掩盖游戏的空洞，使得这款作品难以获得玩家的青睐。对于解谜游戏爱好者来说，这款游戏或许不值得一试。

review:
Took me just over 8 hours to 100% the game.

This is around my 8th time management game and I picked it up for fifty cents and I must say that just like the very first Gnomes Garden game, it's one of the most difficult in the genre that I've ever played. And I've mastered these types of games. It just took me almost an entire hour to 3 star the first 5 levels. That 5th level is insane! And guess what, I'M LOVING IT!!!

I recommend this game to people that enjoy these types of games but are looking for one that is much more difficult than the rest of the pack. The graphics are better than I expected and are in between the original game and say, Lost King. Much closer to Lost King though. The original game has a little bit of older looking graphics but not too old if you know what I mean.

EDIT: After completing the game now, it has become a little easier as you progress, thank god. There still are a few levels here and there that really make you master the level and have to restart due to running out of resources. You eventually get it though. Level 48(I think) is INSANE!!! The trick is to build the 3 resource portal things as early as possible and don't let the green jester enemies steal any gems! Took me a good 5-7 tries but I eventually got it with a tiny amount of time to spare.

Hey everyone and this is my review about the game!

This is a time strategy game.


[h1]Interface/Menu/Settings[/h1]


[quote][b]Video Settings information.[/b][/quote]


[list]

    [*]You can toggle between fullscreen and windowed mode.

[/list]

[quote][b]Volume Settings information.[/b][/quote]

[list]
    [*]There is a music volume slidebar available.
    [*]There is a sound volume slidebar available.
    [*]There is no mute button.
[/list]

[quote][b]Keyboard Controls / Controller / VR Information.[/b][/quote]

[list]
    [*]You can only play this game with a mouse cursor.
    [*]There is no mouse sensitivity slide bar available but you can toggle between desktop cursor or game cursor.
    [*]There is no Controller support.
    [*]There is no VR support.
[/list]

[quote][b]Miscellaneous Information.[/b][/quote]

[list]
    [*]Difficulty progresses along with you the higher your level is. You can't change it.
    [*]Only the English language is available.
    [*]There are no multiple save or profile slots available.
    [*]Options menu is available on the main menu and in-game.
[/list]


[h1]About the game.[/h1]

If you have ever played the game series "labour of hercules" you will know what to do. It's basically the same game but without hercules. You will have to remove obstacles, build and upgrade buildings like sawmills, farms or tents. Gather food and logs and all that within a time limit. The time limit which is shown on the left side of the screen with the green bar also has 3 stars. Your job is to complete and full fill all tasks as quick as you can to get the 3 stars.

You basically complete repeating this process until you have completed all levels in the game.

[quote][b] (Shorter) in-game Information.[/b][/quote]

[list]
    [*]There are cutscenes with subtitles but no voice overs.
    [*]You are able to skip cutscenes.
    [*]Graphics are sort of cartoony.
    [*]Alt tabbing seems to pause the game.
    [*]There is a restart button.
    [*]There is some sort of story.
    [*]There is a tutorial in-game which can be turned off.
    [*]The game starts in a slow and learning progression.
    [*]There are options in-game.
    [*]The levels are time based and each level has 3 stars to be earned.
    [*]There are over 40 levels.

[/list]

[quote][b]Miscellaneous Information.[/b][/quote]

[list]
    [*]The game is worth buying on a discount (50% + ).
    [*]While the game is entertaining it's not worth the full price..
    [*]The game has steam cards.
[/list]

[h1]Other things.[/h1]

This game really reminds me of the "labour of hercules" game series on steam. The game concept is pretty much the same. So you will understand the basics if you have played labour of hercules before. I have been stuck twice on level 4 already forcing me to restart the level due lack of resources. This happened on level 5 and level 6 as well.

[quote] Reviews are always uploaded if i have at least played for 2 hours or more. Unless the game is really garbage and doesn't deserve the 2H limit.[/quote]

-------------------

I Give this game a 3/10

review:
[h1]Short version: 41%[/h1]
Gnomes Garden 3 could be a colourful and cute time manager if not for some design choices. While its cute graphics and simple gameplay are suitable for children, its randomised elements can make it unplayable.

[h1]Long version:[/h1]
The Gnomes Garden games are simple. I would even go as far as saying they are too simple to the point where only children can truly enjoy their barebones gameplay. After all, using up to three workers to gather four resources and pay two helper NPCs to clear all obstacles is as plain as a time manager can get. Although there is some challenge in the form of a clock, all 49 levels have very generous time limits.

The problem with this simplicity is that stages tend to get repetitive and boring. ‘The thief of castles’ tries to find a solution for that, but this is where the game fails. On the first three dozen stages, we always lack one resource, so players have to plan around this shortage—it is a cheap trick, but it kinda works. From Level 37, resource production starts to get randomised, and nothing can be worse in a time manager than waiting for a random drop. As trivial it may sound in writing, this is the biggest reason I cannot recommend Gnomes Garder 3 to anyone.

review:
Gnomes Garden 3 è un gioco Strategico di tipo Manageriale a Tempo ad ambientazione Fantasy. Assolutamente identico al primo e secondo capitolo mantiene i piccoli miglioramenti del 2 e una difficoltà leggermente maggiore.



» Storia - 2/5
Come sempre una storia super semplice, dopo aver salvato ben 2 regni i nostri doveri da principessa non finiscono qui: una volta tornati nel nostro regno c'è un pericolo incombente che dobbiamo assolutamente risolvere

Per quanto riguarda entrambi non c'è molto da dire: nessuna delle due è eccezionale o particolare. La musica si sente che è fatta bene nonostante la ripetitività, mentre la grafica non merita nulla più della sufficienza

» Controlli - 4/5
Rimangono per nostra fortuna i miglioramenti del secondo capitolo, con semplicemente una difficoltà maggiore nei livelli

» Achievement
Tutto sommato semplici da fare, basta completare il gioco al 100%.

» Considerazioni Personali
Mi sento di consigliare questo gioco nonostante la sua mediocrità perché è comunque più che sufficiente per passare il tempo con dei "rompicapi" o se volete solo accumulare giochi da completare al 100% senza troppa fatica.

[b][u]Game Information[/u][/b]

"Gnomes Garden: The Thief of Castles" is a Strategy game. The game was developed by Jerzie and published by 8 Floor Games.

"The Thief of Castles" is the third episode of "Gnomes Garden." Previous episodes: "Gnomes Garden" and "Gnomes Garden 2."

[b][u]The Game Review[/u][/b]

Game Visuals

I want to mention that the visuals in the game are well done. The visuals can be adjusted in the game's option menu.

Game Audio

I want to mention that audio for the game is well done. Even though the audio is somewhat simplistic and repetitive. The audio can be adjusted in the game's option menu as well.

Gameplay

There are no difficulty game modes to choose from. All levels has their own difficulty.

This is a strategy game, where careful planning is required, due to the limited amount of resources that are available.

There are four different landmasses with the total of forty-nine levels. Each of these levels has a set of objectives that needs to be completed.

The level objective tasks can be chained together. As long there is nothing blocking the path and/or enough resources in the storage bins.

All levels have a total of three stars. They are earned from playing the game. The amount of stars that is earned, it depends on how fast the level was completed. There is an opportunity to replay levels for better star rating.

There are special bonus power ups to help complete the level faster. These special bonus power ups come with a time limit. But they can be used again after they have been recharged overtime.

There are twenty-three different achievements that can be unlocked from playing the game. Each of these achievements does come with some requirements that need to be completed before they can be unlocked.

Miscellaneous

There are five different trading cards to collect. Only three of those trading cards are given out by the game. There are several ways to get the rest of the trading cards: Purchased from the Steam's Community Market; Trade with friends; Booster Packs and its Booster Pack Creator.

Final thoughts: I have found the game enjoyable to a certain extent. The replay value for the game is low. I would recommend this game, but not at the game's full price value.

author: {'steamid': '76561198098765263', 'num_games_owned': 819, 'num_reviews': 246, 'playtime_forever': 480, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 480, 'last_played': 1538634370}
review:
Gnomes Garden 3 – короткая и красивая казуальная стратегия. Это третья игра серии «Gnomes Garden». 
Принцесса подружилась с королевой троллей и наконец-то вернулась домой. Но замок вместе с жителями пропал. Волшебник рассказал принцессе, что его похитил колдун-коллекционер, который уменьшал замки и оставлял их у себя в коллекции. Храбрая принцесса отправляется в путешествие ради спасения своих родных.  
Вы играете за принцессу, которая управляет работниками. Управление осуществляется только посредством мыши. В самом начале игры вам предлагают пройти очень понятное обучение. Игра состоит из 4 разных земель, на которых расположены 49 уровней. Каждый из уровней имеет свои собственные цели, которые необходимо выполнить. В игре есть специальные бонусы: увеличение скорости передвижения работников, ускорение выполнения работ, замораживание времени уровня. Все бонусы предоставляются с ограничением по времени, но спустя время их можно использовать повторно. В игре появились новый враги – гремлины, кракены, разумные заросли, их можно усмирить с помощью магии фей и бравого пожарного. 
Графика в игре приятна глазу и не утомляет. Музыкальное сопровождение ненавязчиво и позволяет расслабиться и получить удовольствие от игры. 
В игре имеются 23 достижения, которые легко получить. Имеются коллекционные карточки.
Особенно хочется отметить, что в игре есть русский язык! 
Оценка 10/10

Очередная часть казуальной и увлекательной головоломки-стратегии в жанре [b]Time Management[/b].
Именем прекрасной и доблестной Принцессы гномов Вам предстоит одолеть коварных и злобных приспешников колдуна-коллекционера, узурпировавшего власть в её родном королевстве. В ходе выполнения возложенной миссии Вы столкнетесь с массой занятных задач на внимательность, скорость и логику, научитесь мыслить наперёд и грамотно расставлять приоритеты. 
[u][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1347979410]Навигационная карта[/url][/u] состоит из 50 уровней-пазлов, тематически объединенных в четыре объемные локации - грибную поляну, песчаный карьер, морозную пустошь и выжженный кратер. Условия для их прохождения могут быть разными, однако все они сводятся к быстрому сбору ресурсов с последующим возведением различных построек и расчисткой преград и препятствий. Надо ли говорить, что в этом плане [b]Gnomes Garden 3: The Thief of Castles[/b] практически ничем не отличается от своих жанровых аналогов из [url=https://store.steampowered.com/search/?developer=Creobit]Creobit[/url], [url=https://store.steampowered.com/search/?developer=Rionix]Rionix[/url] и [url=https://store.steampowered.com/search/?developer=Jetdogs%20Studios]Jetdogs Studios[/url].

review:
Gnomes Garden 3 ist ein kurzweiliges Time-Management-Spiel. Hier geht es darum, seine Arbeiter so einzusetzen, dass man in der vorgegebenen Zeit bestimmte Aufgaben erledigt. Zum Beispiel muss man einen Baum magisch wachsen lassen. Dafür braucht man zwei Magierinnen und Ressourcen. Für die Magierinnen benötigt man ein passendes Gebäude der Stufe 2, dafür braucht man wiederum andere Ressourcen. Teile dieser Ressourcen kann man in diesem Level nur durch Handel erlangen. Um an das Handelsgebäude zu kommen, muss erst was beseitigt werden, etc. ... 

Das Zeitlimit ist meist großzügig. Ich konnte beinahe alle Levels auf Anhieb mit den vollen 3 Sternen beenden. Nach 7-8 Stunden sollte man das Spiel durchgespielt haben. 

Insgesamt ein schönes, kleines Strategiespiel für Zwischendurch.

review:
[h1]12 Labours of Hercules의 마이너버전[/h1]

12 Labours of Hercules 와 시스템적으로 유사한 게임으로 12 Labours of Hercules의 조금 마이너한 버전 정도로 생각하시면 되겠습니다.
 
12 Labours of Hercules 게임도 그렇지만 넘버링이 올라가도 게임플레이의 큰 차이점은 없습니다.
1 & 2 편과 다른 점은 고블린의 방해가 기절에서 자원절도로 바뀌었고, Marrymaker 라는 자원채취속도 가속을 할 수 있는 추가 건물이 생겼습니다.

기존의 기절은 방비가 불가능하지만 절도는 자원한개만 가져갈뿐더러 자원을 미리 클릭해서 선점하면 도둑질도 못하게 되어서 이전보다 난이도가 내렸갔으며, Marrymaker 추가건물은 일부 스테이지만 지을수 있으므로 게임 전반적으로 큰 영향은 없다고 볼 수 있습니다. 
물론 있으면 자원채취가 속도가 올라가므로 추가 건물 지을수 있는 스테이지도 난이도가 하락했다고 할 수 있습니다.

결론적으로 기존 게임과 플레이의 변화는 없고 전편과의 차이점은 난이도 하락요소로 작용해서, 게임플레이와 도전과제가 쉬워졌습니다.

가볍게 즐길수 있는 게임을 원하시는분에게 추천합니다.

review:
Feines Spielchen für Zwischendurch!

Hat mir sehr viel Spaß gemacht.
Spielt sich ähnlich wie Hercules, ist aber nicht ganz so schwer und man schafft alle 3 Sterne normalerweise im ersten Durchgang, wenn man vorher Hercules gespielt hat und eine ordentliche Strategie parat hat.
Eher verfranzt man sich gelegentlich mal (ich hatte es ca. 7-8 mal im Spiel) und läuft an Ressourcen tot, ehe man mit der Zeit mal nicht hinkommt (1x beim vorletzten Level, wo mir irgendwie Kristalle fehlten).
Grafik und Sound sind auch ordentlich, Story ist wie den meisten Spielen dieser Art Nebensache.
Das Spiel ist für Erwachsene und auch Kinder geeignet.
Für Abzeichensammler ist es gut zu wissen, dass man den 100% Spielstand sozusagen automatisch mitnimmt.
Ich habe das Spiel an einem Wochenende durchgespielt und war sehr zufrieden damit und warte nun gespannt auf Teil 4 der Serie. :-)

Wertung: 8 / 10

review:
[h1] Information [/h1]

Gnomes Garden 3: The thief of castles ist ein schönes Zeit-Management-Spiel und hat Ähnlichkeiten zu 12 Labours of Hercules, was das Spielprinzip angeht.

[h1] Story/Gameplay [/h1]

Die Prinzessin begibt sich auf eine Reise, um die Trolle zu ihren Verbündeten zu machen. Kaum nach Hause zurückgekehrt, staunt die Prinzessin nicht schlecht: Ihr geliebtes Schloss, mitsamt der wunderschönen Gärten, Springbrunnen und Statuen sind wie vom Erdboden verschluckt! Die Suche führt sie in eine völlig unbekannte Welt ... einen magischen Wald voller Geheimnisse und neuer Freunde. Du schickst deine  Arbeiter Ressourcen einsammeln, diese werden dann genutzt, um Gebäude auszubauen oder Hindernisse zu beseitigen. Allerdings brauchst du schnelle Reflexe und Strategien, um 3 Sterne in den Levels zu bekommen. Das Gameplay kann von ganzer Linie überzeugen und geht gut von der Hand.

[h1] Pro [/h1]

+ tolle Klick-Management-Expedition in unbekannte Welten
+ bunte, farbenfrohe Grafiken 
+ Gute-Laune-Musik
+ 40 rasante Level voller Gefahren
+ Errungenschaften und Trading Cards

[h1] Kontra [/h1]

- Objekte muss man manchmal mehrfach anklicken, das die Arbeiter die Ressourcen einsammeln
- Levels bieten gegen Ende keine Abwechslung mehr

[h1] Fazit  [/h1]

Gnomes Garden 3: The thief of castles kann vor allem durch das gute Level-Design und das süchtig machende Gameplay überzeugen. Wer die Serie um 12 Labours of Hercules mag, wird dieses Spiel sicherlich auch mögen.
